attributes.action: This is a worldwide request to force India to remove lockdown from Kashmir
attributes.additional_details: Because the whole world is suffering with the coronavirus and I feel we need to do something good as a nation so God can do good to the whole world.
attributes.background: In light of the prevailing situation regarding the pandemic across the world, we would like various human rights organisations and influential figures to lobby the United Nations and governments to plead with India to lift its inhumane curfew on the people of Kashmir.

rejection.details:
This isn't something the UK Government or Parliament are responsible for.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300570
